channel.title: Noob question?

item.title: Noob question?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

it says ur not online java…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 06:49:55 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Evan`, post:17, topic:169224”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch™ link=topic=228911.msg1964850#msg1964850 date=1199079330]
Lmao.

Wrong:

Search:

public boolean AttackNPC

Scroll To:

if (c.FightType == 1) // Accurate

You will see this:

if (c.FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); } else if (c.FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); } else if (c.FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); } else if (c.FightType == 5 || c.FightType == 6 || c.FightType == 7) { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerRanged); } else if (c.FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); }

Wooo i beat delta <3.
[/quote]Retard that’s a handled version.[/quote]it ain’t in my SOURCE!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Noob question?

item.description:

Wrong:

Search:

public boolean AttackNPC

Scroll To:

if (c.FightType == 1) // Accurate

You will see this:

if (c.FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); } else if (c.FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); } else if (c.FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); } else if (c.FightType == 5 || c.FightType == 6 || c.FightType == 7) { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerRanged); } else if (c.FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); }

Wooo i beat delta <3.[/quote]Retard that’s a handled version.

if (c.FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); } else if (c.FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); } else if (c.FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); } else if (c.FightType == 5 || c.FightType == 6 || c.FightType == 7) { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerRanged); } else if (c.FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double)(600 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * c.CombatExpRate); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerAttack); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerDefence); c.addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), c.playerStrength); }

item.title: Noob question?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

ok i found this

} CalculateMaxHit(); /*for (int i = 4000; i <= 7000; i++) { sendFrame126("T"+i, i); println_debug("Sended: Test"+i); }*///USED FOR TESTING INTERFACE NUMBERS ! } public void CalculateMaxHit() { double MaxHit = 0; int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.35 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00525)); } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00175)); } MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.1); if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0014); } else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0205); } if (StrPrayer == 1) { //Burst Of Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.005); } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { //Super Human Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.01); } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { //Ultimate Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.015); } playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }

which part do i change to change the exp?

Read full topic
